Uses of Package
org.sibermatica.lang.text.translate

Packages that use org.sibermatica.lang.text.translate
Package
Description
org.sibermatica.lang
Provides highly reusable static utility methods, chiefly concerned with adding value to the java.lang classes.
org.sibermatica.lang.text.translate
An API for creating text translation routines from a set of smaller building blocks.
  • Classes in org.sibermatica.lang.text.translate used by org.sibermatica.lang

    Deprecated.
    As of 3.6, use Apache Commons Text CharSequenceTranslator instead
